text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeURITypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
v2-concCommenthttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentstringV2 Concept Comment
v2-concCommentAsPubhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-concCommentAsPubstringV2 Concept Comment As Published

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0571 defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As PublishedDeutsch (German, de)
ACK AcknowledgeAcknowledgeEmpfangsbestätigung
REJECT RejectReject
PEND PendingPending
ADJZER Adjudicated to ZeroAdjudicated to Zero
ADJSUB Adjudicated as SubmittedAdjudicated as Submitted
ADJ Adjudicated with AdjustmentsAdjudicated with Adjustments
PAID PaidPaid
PRED Pre-DeterminationPre-DeterminationIndicates that the IPR has been adjudicated but will not be paid. Equivalent to ADJUD (Adjudicate)Indicates that the IPR has been adjudicated but will not be paid. Equivalent to ADJUD (Adjudicate)

name: InvoiceProcessingResultsStatus
title: invoiceProcessingResultsStatus
description: Code system of concepts used to specify the processing status for an Invoice Processing Result.  Used in the Invoice Processing Result (IPR) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0571 (Invoice Processing Results Status)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: Indicates that the IPR has been adjudicated but will not be paid.  Equivalent to ADJUD (Adjudicate)
Indicates that the IPR has been adjudicated but will not be paid.  Equivalent to ADJUD (Adjudicate)
